badges.title: Data, AI & Analytics
badges.description: From raw blocks to data diamonds: Use Fabric to mine and shape all your raw data, surface insights in Power BI visualizations, and prepare strong foundations with Fabric IQ so agents and data scientists can discover the true gems. If it's not valuable, keep refining!

badges.title: Low-Code
badges.description: I really love the simplicity of Low code, but also the extent to how far Low code can be taken without having to write PCF or use code. Intelligent and practical usage of the Low code capabilities across the PowerPlatform components is what I'm looking for.

badges.title: Code Connoisseur
badges.description: Psst, come closer - it's all about the code... AI tools: built using code. Data products: coded into existence. Low-code drag-and-drop stuff: the output of a codefest! Demonstrate how code solves a problem. Be innovative, show off, blow our minds!

badges.title: Digital transformation
badges.description: Deliver a solution that helps businesses do more with less, improving customer experience using intelligent automation. Strong entries show measurable impact, improved customer or employee experience, and a clear understanding of how the solution would work in the real world.

badges.title: Governance & Best Practices
badges.description: AI Governance & Best Practices: I will be evaluating hackathon projects with a focus on responsible AI governance and best practices. This includes assessing how teams address ethics, transparency, data privacy, security, fairness, regulatory compliance, and risk management, as well as how thoughtfully AI is integrated into real-world use cases.

badges.title: Redstone Realm
badges.description: Craft a real business solution using the power of Microsoft 365 / Dynamics 365—SharePoint, Teams, Viva Village, Azure lake and more. In this whirlwind era of AI evolution, you're not just placing blocks—you're forging an AI-infused pickaxe that helps you mine insights faster than ever. Prioritize accessibility, privacy, and a smooth player experience.

badges.title: Community Champion
badges.description: Goes out of their way to help and encourage other teams.

badges.title: Dooh
badges.description: Goes out of their way to create something extraordinarily useless or does something really really stupid!

badges.title: Early Delivery
badges.description: First end-to-end working solution or detailed plan of solution delivery. Must be delivered before lunch (Thursday 12:00).

badges.title: Happy Camper
badges.description: Using gadgets, costumes or similar to create a really cool camp, and keep extraordinary team spirit throughout the event.

badges.title: Morning Glory
badges.description: Starting the day before the sun rises.

badges.title: Remarkable Teamspirit
badges.description: Keeps an extraordinary good team spirit throughout the day. Snap a picture and post to social media to spread the word.

badges.title: Sharing is Caring
badges.description: Code, dataset or Api is made available for other teams and you do a sensible contribution (pull request, Integration) on a competing teams solution.

badges.title: Thieving Bastards
badges.description: Uses several third-party solutions in the delivery, opensource or payable solutions made available by others. Show the importance of leveraging existing tools and APIs.

badges.title: Chameleon
badges.description: Solution is responsive. Adapts to all devices and screen sizes.

badges.title: Crawler
badges.description: Using search in an innovative, useful way. Solve a business problem!

badges.title: Dash It Out
badges.description: Create great looking dashboards with graphs, kpis and reports using your preferred data visulization framework. Minimum 4 graphs, gauges or kpi's. Make sure the dashboard shows business-value.

badges.title: Dataminer
badges.description: Uses external data to add business-value to existing data in your solution, or mine after gold in you own data and present it in an excellent way.

badges.title: Embedding numbnut
badges.description: Integrate into everything that flips bits.

badges.title: Feature Bombing
badges.description: On popular demand the feature bombing badge is back! But this time cram as many user features into one screen as you can. Five or more and you might get some points. If you go all aboard and it all makes sense, extra points.

badges.title: Glossy Pixels
badges.description: Shiny, beautiful, glossy user interfaces would earn this badge, it won't break on small screens right?

badges.title: Go With The Flow
badges.description: Implement workflow to improve business productivity in a solution. Do you have a process that can be automated?

badges.title: Hipster
badges.description: Show use of the hippest coolest tech.

badges.title: Nasty Hacker
badges.description: Creating superdirty hacks to achieve awesomeness.

badges.title: Plug N' Play
badges.description: This is all about Apps. Create an app/plugin for a Microsoft Product (Teams, SharePoint, Dynamics, Office 365, VS Code, Visual Studio etc.). And don't forget that it has to solve a business need.

badges.title: Power User Love
badges.description: Show a good example of how to use your preffered low-code platform combined with pro code customization.

badges.title: Retro badge
badges.description: Doing something cool with late technologies. It's all legacy now, baby!

badges.title: Show And Tell
badges.description: Got a great, well thought idea with some cool sketches? Maybe you can get a badge for that.

badges.title: Stairway To Heaven
badges.description: Combine at least three different Microsoft cloud Api's and the badge could be yours!

badges.title: The Existential Risk
badges.description: Demonstrate and integrate AI that shows an existential risk for the world. Does your solution have a conscience? Can it think on its own, Is it smarter than a 5'th grader?

badges.title: ACDC Craftsman
badges.description: Practicing development and deployment best-practice. Can only be claimed on day 3 in a single post, where you demonstrate true ACDC craftmanship.

badges.title: Client Side Salsa
badges.description: Showcases well structured, modern client-side solutions with attention to performance, maintainability, and a great user experience.

badges.title: Power Of The Shell
badges.description: Script the config of your entire solution. Azure infrastructure as code, ARM, PowerShell, CI/CD.

badges.title: Right Now
badges.description: Doing something collaborative in real-time with socket.io, signalR, WebSocket etc. Don't repeat yourself! Expecting to see code on this one.

badges.title: Best Build
badges.description: Awarded to the best build inside team claim land.

badges.title: Escape the Screen
badges.description: Your challenge is to create an interactive experience which escapes the confines of the screen! It might be a game which turns external lights on or off; maybe it's a mischievous chatbot which accepts voice commands but prints out its answers; could it be a strange app which plays music. Show us the power of your imagination.

badges.title: MSCRM-Addons
badges.description: Pick one of the amazing addons from MSCRM-addons and incorporate it into your solution. Write a blog

badges.title: Link Mobility
badges.description: Link Mobility are opening up their API and providing some of the best solutions within communication

badges.title: OneFlow
badges.description: OneFlow being the marketing leader in document signing are providing their solution for all teams to
